title: Attitude-Based Learner Profile Analysis and Customized Online Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital literacy and attitude learning experiences
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, emphasizing work relevance for professionals

learning_goals: Learners can measure and analyze their happiness levels using a self-assessment tool that tracks attitude changes over 10 weeks.
By applying a mixed-methods research approach (survey + interview), learners can classify learner profiles into two types and explain their characteristics.
Learners can design optimal instructional strategies based on learning styles (exploratory/instructor-led) and apply them in corporate training settings.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
